alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 21 at 2:44PM PDT until March 24 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, except 12 to 25 inches above 2500 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. In Washington, South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills
